title: [GAMEPLAY] Warwick Q/W Not Working After Ulti
body: For a couple months now, using {{champion:19}} 's Q and W (health swipe and attack speed boost) won't work after using his ult.  This has happened in several instances, in bot games and PvP, on the Rift and Crystal Scar and Howling Abyss maps (I don't play Twisted Treeline).  I paid attention to make sure I wasn't being stunned, silenced, or that the abilities were on cooldown (they weren't) but when I would specifically play against bots who did not have a stun or silence and make sure I hadn't previously used any abilities, it would still not work for about 3-5 seconds after the ulti had finished.  There are a few discussion board posts and several bug posts about this and I'm shocked it hasn't been fixed yet.  It makes him a lot less useful to play than he was even a few months ago.

replies.body: Riot claims they have been looking into it for about 4 months now. I don't see how it could take that long
end of season is coming soon, I hope they fix this so I can win some warwick games in ranked
I believe this is a known issue and riot has been looking into for some time.
This has also happen to me, I hope it gets fixed =(
